title: Wandering Puppeteers (Wandernde Puppenspieler) (in-text plate, page 29) from Der Findling (The Foundling)
medium: One from an illustrated book with twenty line block reproductions after woodcuts, one line block reproduction after drawing on title page, and one line block reproduction after drawing (duplicate of title page) on front cover
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 3 3/8 x 4 5/16" (8.5 x 11 cm); page: 12 3/16 x 9 1/4" (31 x 23.5 cm)
